text:
No trip to Dublin would be complete without
going to the Guinness Storehouse

make sure you do a tour to learn all about
the history
and drink a pint or two

We’re starting our Guinness tour right where
it all began

this is where Sir Arthur Guinness started
his journey making

great Guinness beer
and it’s going to be here for another 9000 years
because he signed a 9000 year lease

so I think it’s going to stick around a
while!

Remember everybody Guinness is good for you
so have at least two
maybe three

We’ve come to the interactive part of our
Guinness tour

the tasting room
follow me
it’s a room of magic
welcome
well hello thank you so much
cutest little Guinness you’re ever likely to see
oh look at this cute little mini pint of Guinness here
do I smell it like wine?

Smell it get the aroma
and then make sure to draw through the foam

of the beer
don’t sip it the foam
OK draw through
Draw through
Am I in Heaven?
I think so!
Cheers!
I love this room

There’s all this aroma
all the different aromas that you smell in

the Guinness
are coming out of the vats of dry ice
it’s delicious

This is the only portrait of Sir Arthur Guinness
anywhere in the world right here
in the Guinness Storehouse

We had a great time here today at the Guinness
Storehouse in Dublin

Donald thank you so much for helping us out
today

you’re a great guide!
Well thank you very much for coming out
it was great to have you and show you around
